hero.label: PROGRAM 2026
hero.headline: Leaving a mark. Creating future.
hero.subheadline: Training, mentorship, and community for women entrepreneurs who want to grow.

program.headline: Huella Mujer Program
program.body: A social project that strengthens the economic autonomy of women entrepreneurs with e-commerce tools, business development, and connection to global markets.

mentorship.title: Mentorship
mentorship.desc: Support to define your business model.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Network of allies, opportunities, and visibility.

modules.headline: Program Modules
modules.subheadline: Learn at your own pace with practical content and mentorship.

marketplaces.title: Marketplaces
marketplaces.desc: Publish, price, and manage orders in digital markets.

social.title: Social Media
social.desc: Create content, schedule posts, and convert followers into customers.

brand.title: Brand & Logistics
brand.desc: Packaging, shipping, and a memorable brand.

conferences.headline: Conferences
conferences.body: In-person and virtual meetings to train skills, answer questions, and connect with other entrepreneurs.

testimonials.headline: Testimonials
testimonials.subheadline: Stories from those who have already left their mark.

lucia.name: Lucía R.
lucia.quote: I learned to sell on marketplaces and doubled my orders in three months.

mariana.name: Mariana T.
mariana.quote: The mentorship helped me organize my time and my brand.

sofia.name: Sofía L.
sofia.quote: Today I have clients outside the city thanks to the community.

speakers.headline: Speakers
speakers.subheadline: Experts who share what really works.

impact.headline: Real Impact
impact.body: Every number is a story of learning, sales, or connection that changed a business.

form.headline: Write your story
form.body: Tell us about yourself and your business. We will contact you with the next call.

fields.product: What product or service do you offer?
fields.digitalLevel: What level do you consider yourself in using digital tools?
fields.motivation: Why do you want to participate in the Huella Mujer project?

motivation.formalize: To formalize and strengthen my business
motivation.brand: To create or improve my brand

form.success: Thank you! Your application has been submitted. We will contact you soon.

volunteers.headline: Join Huella Mujer
volunteers.body: Be part of our volunteer team and help empower women entrepreneurs.

fields.experience: Do you have previous volunteer experience?
fields.availability: What is your availability to support us?

volunteers.success: Thank you for your interest! We will review your application and contact you.

hours.title: Business Hours
hours.weekdays: Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM
